column1: Guskhara Airfield is a former wartime United States Army Air Forces airfield in India used during the Burma Campaign 1944-1945. It is now abandoned.
Guskhara was a photo-recon base for the Tenth Air Force during 1944–1945. Its primary tenants were the following units:
8th Photographic Reconnaissance Group20th Tactical Reconnaissance Squadron 5 January-26 March 1944
40th Photographic Reconnaissance Squadron 18 July-9 August 194435th Photographic Reconnaissance Squadron (F-5/P-38) June 13
